Name: Kursor
About the game: The ball chases the mouse cursor. Gameplay Go through all circles and dodge all the obstacles to advance levels. The ball accelerates and decelerates according to the distance it is from the cursor. Innovative gameplay. Dozens of levels. Minimalist design. Simple controls.
